body_html: It is not related to #2198, it is an overflow in reserve size (reserve size becomes more than 2^32). Happens likely on the python ctypes side, because in cudnn argument type for reserveSpaceSizeInBytes is size_t (should not overflow), and even though reserve_size.value is 4730880000, cudnn sees it as 435912704 (via ltrace, for sequence length of 5600 instead of 6000).

body: It is not related to #2198, it is an overflow in reserve size (reserve size becomes more than 2^32). Happens likely on the python ctypes side, because in cudnn argument type for reserveSpaceSizeInBytes is size_t (should not overflow), and even though reserve_size.value is 4730880000, cudnn sees it as 435912704 (via ltrace, for sequence length of 5600 instead of 6000).
